scripts.ns.setup: npm uninstall -g nativescript && npm install -g nativescript
scripts.nuki: npm run nuke && npm run setup
scripts.global.installs: npm i -g rimraf && npm i -g typescript
scripts.setup: npm run global.installs && npm run setup.nonglobal
scripts.setup.nonglobal: npm run nuke && npm i && npm run setup.ns.bluetooth && npm run setup.ns.animated-circle && npm run setup.libs && npm run setup.smartdrive.app
scripts.clean.all: npm run clean && npm run clean.libs && npm run clean.ns.bluetooth && npm run clean.ns.animated-circle && npm run clean.sd && npm run clean.pt
scripts.clean.sd: cd apps/smartdrive && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.clean.pt: cd apps/pushtracker && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.sd.brad: cd apps/smartdrive && tsc && tns run android --bundle --device 8606X91120272
scripts.sd.a: cd apps/smartdrive && tsc && npm run scss && tns run android --bundle
scripts.sd.a.report: cd apps/smartdrive && tsc && npm run scss && tns run android --bundle  --env.report
scripts.sd.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartdrive.wearos > layout-profile.txt
scripts.sd.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartdrive.wearos framestats > framestats.txt
scripts.pt.brad: cd apps/pushtracker && tsc && tns run android --bundle --device 8606X91120272
scripts.pt.a: cd apps/pushtracker && tsc && npm run scss && tns run android --bundle
scripts.pt.a.report: cd apps/pushtracker && tsc && npm run scss && tns run android --bundle  --env.report
scripts.pt.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.pushtracker.wearos > layout-profile.txt
scripts.pt.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.pushtracker.wearos framestats > framestats.txt
